title: Amaresh Godbole made digital tech business CEO at Publicis - Economic Times
content: Amaresh Godbole made digital tech business CEO at Publicis  Economic Times
description: He will report to Anupriya Acharya, CEO of Publicis Groupe South Asia. "In Amaresh, we have someone who deeply understands the Publicis way of working and also brings an outside-in view of technology trends and the wider industry from his time with Google," said Acharya.
